40075000.Chinese_Text: （这里，<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>前哨</>建了……\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>这个地方

40075001.Original_Text: (풍백문 대원들이 이렇게 되다니... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>은 왜 이런 짓을?)
40075001.English_Text: (Pungbaekmun crews are like this... Why is the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> doing this?)
40075001.Chinese_Text: （风白门剧组就是这样……为什么<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>要这样做？）

40075002.Chinese_Text: （为什么 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Suwa</> 在这里充满敌意？\n需要调查）

40075003.English_Text: (After all, these are also victims, right?)

40075004.English_Text: (Did you come to live here after it was flooded?)
40075004.Chinese_Text: （你是被洪水淹没后才来这里住的吗？）

40075005.Chinese_Text: （这里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>守墓人</>是不是对所有人都怀有敌意？）

40075006.English_Text: (There is also <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're dark</> here. \nLet's investigate and pass)
40075006.Chinese_Text: （还有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>你很黑</>这里。\n让我们调查并通过）

40075007.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Erosioned gloom</>la... \nThe effect of takrate here too?)
40075007.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>侵蚀的阴郁</>la...\ntakrate 的效果也在这里？)

40075008.English_Text: (The ashes make it difficult to breathe... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Doesn't it matter to antler</>?)
40075008.Chinese_Text: （灰烬使人呼吸困难……<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角没关系</>？）

40075009.Chinese_Text: （这是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>野兽突变体</>吗？\n我需要调查）

40075010.English_Text: (It's a lot of land here, so I hope the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>beasts</> can have their \n ​​place)
40075010.Chinese_Text: （这里有很多土地，所以我希望<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>野兽</>可以有他们的\n地方）

40075011.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>사슴</>들이 좋아하는 숲이 아니라 \n이런 곳에 모여 있다니...)
40075011.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>It's not the forest that deer </> love, \nit's gathered in a place like this...)
40075011.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿</>爱的不是森林，\n它聚集在这样的地方......)

40075012.Chinese_Text: （看起来很奇怪<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鸟</>。\n让我们检查更多）

40075013.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bird</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> combination... \nAren't they attacking each other?
40075013.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bird</> 和 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> 组合......\n他们不是在互相攻击吗？

40075014.English_Text: (There is also a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>one-eyed</> here. \nShould I check it out?)
40075014.Chinese_Text: （这里还有一个 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>独眼</>。\n我应该检查一下吗？）

40075015.Original_Text: (한 눈으로도 살 수 있도록 \n적응해 온 걸까?)
40075015.English_Text: (Have you adapted to living with one eye?)
40075015.Chinese_Text: （你适应用一只眼睛生活了吗？）

40075016.English_Text: (A dark forest may be the best environment for metallurgy)
40075016.Chinese_Text: （一片黑暗的森林可能是最好的冶金环境）

40075017.English_Text: (The enemies here are strong. \nYou need to be careful with your investigation)
40075017.Chinese_Text: （这里的敌人很强。\n你需要小心你的调查）

40075021.Chinese_Text: （这里的环境可能已经创建了 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Venombug</> 的 \npoison...）

40075022.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>As soon as they burn</>... \nI better check and go)
40075022.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>一旦燃烧</>...\n我最好检查一下然后走)

40075023.English_Text: (The environment has gotten so bad here \ndue to continuous cracks)
40075023.Chinese_Text: （这里的环境变得很糟糕\n由于不断的裂缝）

40075024.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Filled</> is endless. \nWhere did they come from?)
40075024.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Filled</> 是无穷无尽的。\n它们从哪里来？)

40075026.Original_Text: (이 정도 크기의 균열은 처음 보는 것 같다. 피해 지역이 넓구나)
40075026.English_Text: (I think it's the first time I've seen a crack of this size. The damage area is wide)
40075026.Chinese_Text: （我想这是我第一次看到这么大的裂缝。破坏范围很广）

40075028.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> manages a large number of people while operating <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Supply Station</>)
40075028.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>在操作<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>补给站</>时管理着大量人员)

40075029.Original_Text: (이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>효조</>를 길들인 것도 정상적인 방법은 아니었을 거야)
40075029.English_Text: (It must not have been a normal way to tame this <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hyojo</>)
40075029.Chinese_Text: （这肯定不是驯服这个 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hyojo</> 的正常方法）

40075030.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>(검은새벽단 수용소</>... 갑자기 적들이 강해졌다는 생각이 든다)
40075030.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>(Blackdawn Asylum</>... I have a feeling that the enemies have suddenly become stronger)
40075030.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>(Blackdawn Asylum</>...我有一种敌人突然变得更强大的感觉)

40075031.English_Text: (Did the people who disappeared here and there come to this place?)
40075031.Chinese_Text: （到处消失的人有没有来过这个地方？）

40075032.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야수</>들을 길들이기 위해 좋지 않은 방법을 썼겠지)
40075032.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You must have done something bad to tame the beast</>)
40075032.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>你一定做了坏事来驯服这头野兽</>)

40075035.Original_Text: (뭔가 굉장한 기운이 느껴진다. \n이곳의 탐사는 조심해야 해)
40075035.English_Text: (Something great energy is felt. \nYou have to be careful about exploring here)
40075035.Chinese_Text: （感觉到某种巨大的能量。\n在这里探索时必须小心）

40075036.Original_Text: (기름진 땅이라거나 살기 좋은 땅도 아니다. 뭔가 목적이 있을 거야)
40075036.English_Text: (Not fertile or livable. There must be a purpose)
40075036.Chinese_Text: （不肥沃也不宜居。一定有目的）

40075037.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Even the predator</> has been checked. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haeryongsanmaek</> area check is complete)
40075037.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>即使是捕食者</>也已通过检查。\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haeryongsanmaek</> 区域检查已完成）

40075038.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>곰</>과 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미</>가 여기에 나와있다는 건 환경이 이상하다는 거겠지?)
40075038.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bear</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spider</> appearing here means weird environment?
40075038.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bear</> 和 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spider</> 出现在这里意味着环境很奇怪？

40075039.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>두억시니</>? 이곳의 적들은 강하다.\n탐사할 때 주의할 필요가 있겠어)
40075039.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Are you dumb</>? The enemies here are strong.\nYou'll need to be careful when exploring)
40075039.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>你是不是傻</>？这里的敌人很强。\n探索时需要小心)

40075040.English_Text: (It's such a big body... \nhow do you get enough food?)

40075041.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandala flower</> doesn't seem to have any problem with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Douoksi</>)
40075041.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Douoksi</>似乎没有任何问题)

40075042.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>How did the Myomyeons</> come to live in this forest?)
40075042.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeons</> 是如何在这片森林中生活的？)

40075044.English_Text: (Did this forest energy make <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Guard Spirit</> like that?)
40075044.Chinese_Text: （这种森林能量是否让<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>守灵</>变成那样？）

40075045.English_Text: (There are a variety of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bullshit</>. \nIt won't be easy to deal with)
40075045.Chinese_Text: （有各种各样的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>胡说八道</>。\n它不会好对付的）

40075046.Original_Text: (언젠가는 이곳은 다시 \n살아있는 땅으로 되돌려야 할 텐데...)
40075046.English_Text: (Someday, this place will have to be returned to the \nliving land...)
40075046.Chinese_Text: （总有一天，这个地方将不得不回到\nliving土地......）

40075047.Chinese_Text: （此处 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Predator</> 看起来很危险。检查一下）

40075049.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Guard Spirit</>why is this hostile behavior... \nLet's investigate)
40075049.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Guard Spirit</>为什么会有这种敌对行为......\n让我们调查一下)

40075050.Chinese_Text: （这里，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dinosaur </> 和 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Twinkle </> ... \n我应该检查一下吗？）

40075051.English_Text: (Even in such a barren environment, you are somehow living \n)
40075051.Chinese_Text: （即使在如此贫瘠的环境中，你也以某种方式活着\n）

40075052.Original_Text: (여기 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수목정령</>은 껍질을 보니 \n꽤나 오래 살아온 것 같아)
40075052.English_Text: (Here, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The tree spirit</> looks like it has lived for quite a while, looking at the shell)
40075052.Chinese_Text: （这里，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>树精</>看起来已经活了很长时间了，看着外壳）

40075053.Chinese_Text: （这是 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>安特卫普</>。\n让我们调查一下）
